name: Dark Souls Limbo Mode
tagline: Limbo Mode for Dark Souls, integrated with DSFix
body:
# Description

This is a version of [DSFix](http://blog.metaclassofnil.com/?tag=dsfix) with additional features, primarily the "Limbo Mod", inspired by [this reddit post](https://www.reddit.com/r/darksouls/comments/396yz3/my_graphics_broke_in_an_interesting_way/) and [LobosJr's limbo run](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sh1AYgJKbHk).

# Screenshots
![Screen 1](http://i.imgur.com/Q1CGFeF.png)  ![Screen 2](http://i.imgur.com/yCT2iyA.png)

# Tutorial Video
[![Tutorial Video](http://img.youtube.com/vi/L3_R_0ogR8I/0.jpg)](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L3_R_0ogR8I "How To: Ghassan's Limbo Mod for Dark Souls")
